from __future__ import absolute_import, division, print_function
from utool import util_inject

(print, print_, printDBG, rrr, profile) = util_inject.inject(__name__, '[config]')



[docs]def read_repo_config():
    pass




[docs]def get_default_repo_config():
    """
    import utool
    """
    REPO_CONFIG = {
        'project_name': None,
        'authors': [],
        'licence': None,
        'enable_cyth': None,
        'docstr_style': None,
    }

    return REPO_CONFIG




[docs]def get_default_global_config():
    GLOBAL_CONFIG = {
        # Supplementary Info
        'AUTHORS': {
            'username': {'name': None, 'email': None,},
            'kingarthur': {
                'name': 'Arthur, King of the Britans',
                'email': 'kingarthur@camelot.com',
                'permited repos': ['kotr'],
                'aliases': [],
                'machines': [],
                'quest': 'To seek the holy grail.',
                'sa5ws5%lp&30sjnk': 'What to you mean? An African or European swallow?',
            },
            'joncrall': {
                'name': 'Jon Crall',
                'email': 'erotemic@gmail.com',
                'permited repos': [
                    'wbia',
                    'utool',
                    'hesaff',
                    'guitool',
                    'plottool',
                    'vtool',
                ],
                'aliases': [],
                'machines': [],
            },
        },
    }
    return GLOBAL_CONFIG




[docs]def write_default_repo_config():
    import utool

    CONFIG_DICT = utool.get_default_repo_config()
    config_str = utool.repr2(CONFIG_DICT, strvals=True, newlines=True, recursive=True)
    print(config_str)



if __name__ == '__main__':
    """
    CommandLine:
        python -m utool.util_config
        python -m utool.util_config --allexamples
        python -m utool.util_config --allexamples --noface --nosrc
    """
    import multiprocessing

    multiprocessing.freeze_support()  # for win32
    import utool as ut  # NOQA

    ut.doctest_funcs()
